functional.title: System Functions
functional.description: Moreover, system functionalities are as follows: submitting the CV, viewing and editing the CV, answering screening questions, and getting a rating for the submitted CV.

functional.title: Detailed Functional Specification
functional.description: The system uses the Python library for parsing the CV and extracting key information such as skills and years of experience, which are then compared to the job requirements provided by the recruiter.

non_functional.title: Performance:
non_functional.description: The system must provide a fast and efficient parsing process, with a response time of less than 2 seconds for a typical CV.

non_functional.title: Reliability:
non_functional.description: The system shall be designed to be highly reliable, with a uptime of at least 99.9% and a mean time between failures (MTBF) of at least 1000 hours.

non_functional.title: Security:
non_functional.description: The system must ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of user data, and must comply with all relevant data protection regulations.

non_functional.title: Privacy:
non_functional.description: The system shall respect user privacy and must not collect or store any personal data without explicit user consent.

non_functional.title: Scalability:
non_functional.description: The system should be designed to scale horizontally, with the ability to handle a large number of concurrent users and a high volume of CVs.

non_functional.title: Usability:
non_functional.description: The system must be user-friendly and easy to navigate, with clear and concise instructions and feedback.

non_functional.title: Maintainability:
non_functional.description: The system should be designed to be easily maintainable, with clear and modular code and a robust testing framework.

non_functional.title: Compatibility:
non_functional.description: The system must be compatible with a wide range of browsers and devices, and must work seamlessly with the HR module from Odoo ERP software.

non_functional.title: Integration:
non_functional.description: The system should be designed to integrate seamlessly with other systems and tools, such as ChatGPT and the HR module from Odoo ERP software.
